cards.example: 我今天头疼，不想去学校。
cards.examplePinyin: Wǒ jīntiān tóuténg, bù xiǎng qù xuéxiào.
cards.exampleTranslation: I have a headache today and don't want to go to school.

cards.examplePinyin: Tā fāshāo le, yào qù kàn yīshēng.
cards.exampleTranslation: She has a fever and needs to see a doctor.

cards.definition: to catch a cold; a cold
cards.examplePinyin: Wǒ gǎnmào le, hěn bù hǎo.
cards.exampleTranslation: I caught a cold and feel terrible.

cards.definition: to get sick; to fall ill
cards.examplePinyin: Tā shēngbìng le, bù néng lái xuéxiào.
cards.exampleTranslation: He got sick and can't come to school.

cards.examplePinyin: Nǐ lèi le, yào duō xiūxi.
cards.exampleTranslation: You're tired; you should rest more.

cards.examplePinyin: Yīshēng gěi le wǒ yìxiē yào.
cards.exampleTranslation: The doctor gave me some medicine.
Good health is the best thing.
